price: Kuma da Zakariyya a sa'ad da ya kirãyi Ubangijinsa cẽwa, "Ya Ubangiji! Kada Ka bar ni makaɗaici alhãli kuwa Kai ne Mafi alhẽrin mãsu gãdo."
arabic: وَزَكَرِيَّآ إِذۡ نَادَىٰ رَبَّهُۥ رَبِّ لَا تَذَرۡنِي فَرۡدٗا وَأَنتَ خَيۡرُ ٱلۡوَٰرِثِينَ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wazakariyyā idh nādā rabbahu rabbi lā tadharnī fardan wa-anta khayru al-wārithīna
